name: Enervision
description:
Enervision!

Play as a robot that wakes up with memory loss and journeys to find its true founder. Throughout the way, you will find clues and letters to guide you through the story. 

Enervision is one of the near-proper games that I've made and had the opportunity to explore the workings of developing the game and then publish it in itch.io with the guidance of IGA. 

With the thanks of Indie Game Academy, I could explore my game narrative deeper, prepare a vision of what the game could be and understand a future role in game design.

Music Credit:

  • Main Menu - Friday Downtown by Mindseye
  • Level 1 - Friday Downtown by Mindseye
  • Level 2 - Summer Breeze by Mindseye
  • Level 3 - Contemplation by Maarten Schellekens

Visuals:

  • Canva: Pixelated building assets - Deigo Solas
  • Canva: Retro background - NotjungCg
  • Canva: Pixelated assets - DAPA
